item.description:
It's cold and snowing! Let's be kids and come out for SNOW TUBING ******

Where: find the Asians grouping near the ticket booth.
When: 2pm
Cost: $21 (2 hrs) or $23 (3 hrs) + $1 meetup fee

Dinner after tubing (optional):
Where: Scupper Jack's (http://www.scupperjac...)
Address: 3 Nagog Park, Route 2A, Acton, MA 01720

If you need a ride or can provide a ride, please note it in your RSVP. We suggest you chip in some gas $ for the ride provider. Thank you and Happy New Year everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll wait for you at the ticket booth. I'll email the organizers' cell numbers to those who RSVPed.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: SNOW TUBING
